title: Ep. 09 - 2 Bears 1 Cave 2 w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description: The 2 Bears are back in the 1 Cave and Sober October is almost at the half way point. The wheels are coming off in some ways and we find out if Bert's family would be sad if he left us. Did you know you can text P. Diddy and other celebrities now? We put it to the test. Plus Spear Fishing, Private Jets and is Bert the Master of Impressions?
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)

Plus Spear Fishing, Private Jets and is Bert the Master of Impressions?
